 URL : "https://github.com/kangzeroo/Kangzeroos-AWS-Cognito-Boilerplate/issues/2" TITLE : project is not stable BODY : after cloning the project and running npm install and npm run start, when i access the url http://localhost:8080/webpack-dev-server/index.html i get the following stack trace: uncaught typeerror: super expression must either be null or a function, not undefined at _inherits style.js:25 at style.js:28 at object.defineproperty.value style.js:92 at __webpack_require__ bootstrap ff3d311…:19 at object.<anonymous> index.js:15 at object.defineproperty.value bundle.js:29654 at __webpack_require__ bootstrap ff3d311…:19 at object.defineproperty.value app.js:14 at __webpack_require__ bootstrap ff3d311…:19 at object.<anonymous> index.js:7 what should i do to make it work again? thank you!
